comments.body: Maybe a quick comment on what this is used for (the name is pretty good, but maybe we could contextualize 'default' a bit, or help clarify that "local file" means FileStore and and "artifact" means AbstractStore).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@# Also used as default location for artifacts, when not provided, in non local file based backends
# (eg MySQL)
DEFAULT_LOCAL_FILE_AND_ARTIFACT_PATH = "./mlruns"
